name: Bern's Breeding Sim [Subscriber Prototype]
description:
Note: This game is currently only accessible through keys given to Subscribestar members! If you want to give this game a try in its current form and have your input considered for the final build, consider checking things out over on Subscribestar.

Thanks again!

The Story

You, yes (You) are the player. A dutiful, albeit slightly boring guy who works hard and does his best in a thankless 9-to-5. Fate throws a wrench in your mundane plans for the future when your uncle asks you a huge favor: take care of his daughter's friend, Bern.

The harpy herself is unimposing and shy, and cute as a button to boot. Maybe she's not a burden at all, and something may blossom, between the two of you...

Features
  • Customize Bern's hair and clothes~
  • Your choices in conversations with Bern determine how she feels about you, and make it easier (or harder) to romance her~
  • Play a number of mini-games with Bern and unlock items to customize her appearance or make her happy~
  • Take your newly acquired harpy GF on dates~
